AbilityDescription: Allows users to mark a person as their target: any weapon thrown with that same hand will chase after said person.
Name: any weapon thrown with that same hand will chase after said person. User

AbilityDescription: Allows users to create dango from their cheeks; any animal that eats said dango is immediately tamed.
